title: 3 and Out - New Roster Rules; Watson Deal No-Brainer; Division Winners; 5 Biggest 2020 Questions; Rodgers vs. Love, Trubisky vs. Foles; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - New Roster Rules; Watson Deal No-Brainer; Division Winners; 5 Biggest 2020 Questions; Rodgers vs. Love, Trubisky vs. Foles; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John discuses the biggest adjustments teams will have to make for the 2020 season with expanded rosters, and what makes Deshaun Watson worth every penny of his 4-year extension with the Texans. He also gives his division winner picks, his top 5 questions heading into the season, looks at the quarterback pictures for the Packers with Aaron Rodgers and Jordan Love, and the Bears with Mitchell Trubisky beating out Nick Foles, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
